Package fr.hes.raynaudmonitoring

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CustomEditText.KeyImeChange  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddCrisisActivity
    An Activity who add an instance of Crisis to the DataBase This activity is also used to update a crisis This activity contains 2 fragment
    AddRemindersActivity
    An Activity who add an instance of Reminder to the DataBase This activity is also used to update a reminders
    AddTreatmentActivity
    An Activity who add an instance of Treatment to the DataBase This activity is also used to update a treatment
    AddTreatmentActivity.AlarmReceiver  
    AlarmReceiverCrisis
    A class that builds a notification for crises
    AlarmReceiverRcs
    A class that builds a notification for RCS
    AlarmReceiverTreatment
    A class that builds a notification for Treatment
    CamTestActivity
    An activity that manages the stream of the phone's native camera
    Constants  
    Crisis  
    CustomEditText  
    DatabaseManager
    Class that contains all the static methods for adding, modifying, and removing items from the database All data are managed by the Couchbase library
    DateManager
    A simple class who generate an instance of DatePickerDialog and provide static methods to handle relationships between dates
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    LoginActivity  
    MainActivity
    The main activity that contains all the fragments
    MainFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    NotesFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass from the AddCrisisActivity.
    PicturesFragment  
    PicturesPreviewActivity
    An Activity to preview and analyze pictures
    Preview
    Class not used, delete
    Reminder
    Reminder's POJO (Plain Old Java Object)
    RemindersAdapter
    an Adapter object acts as a bridge between an AdapterView and the Reminder The Adapter is also responsible for making a View for each item in the data set.
    RemindersFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    Settings
    This activity generates a report in pdf format containing all the data stored in the database
    ThermoActivity
    The main activity who read the stream from the Flir One Pro camera
    ThermoFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    ThermoPreviewActivity
    An activity that displays thermography with temperature
    Treatment
    Treatment Object
    TreatmentAdapter
    an Adapter object acts as a bridge between an AdapterView and the Treatment The Adapter is also responsible for making a View for each item in the data set.
